segment.source: How to Localize the “HelpdeskText” Statement that Points Users to More Self-Service Portal Information
segment.target: How to Localize the “HelpdeskText” Statement that Points Users to More Self-Service Portal Information

segment.source: How to Localize the “HelpdeskText” Statement that Points Users to More Self-Service Portal Information
segment.target: How to Localize the “HelpdeskText” Statement that Points Users to More Self-Service Portal Information

segment.source: How to Localize the “HelpdeskText” Statement that Points Users to More Self-Service Portal Information
segment.target: How to Localize the “HelpdeskText” Statement that Points Users to More Self-Service Portal Information

segment.source: You can configure a localized version of the Self-Service Portal "HelpdeskText" statement, which informs end users about how to get additional help when they are using the Self-Service Portal.
segment.target: You can configure a localized version of the Self-Service Portal "HelpdeskText" statement, which informs end users about how to get additional help when they are using the Self-Service Portal.

segment.source: If you configure localized text for the statement, as described in the following instructions, MBAM displays the localized version.
segment.target: If you configure localized text for the statement, as described in the following instructions, MBAM displays the localized version.

segment.source: If MBAM does not find the localized version, it displays the value that is in the HelpdeskText parameter.
segment.target: If MBAM does not find the localized version, it displays the value that is in the HelpdeskText parameter.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: In the following instructions, SelfService is the default virtual directory name for the Self-Service Portal.
segment.target: In the following instructions, SelfService is the default virtual directory name for the Self-Service Portal.

segment.source: You might have used a different name when you configured the Self-Service Portal.
segment.target: You might have used a different name when you configured the Self-Service Portal.

segment.source: To display a localized version of the HelpdeskText statement
segment.target: To display a localized version of the HelpdeskText statement

segment.source: On the server where you configured the Self-Service Portal, browse to SitesMicrosoft BitLocker Administration and MonitoringSelfServiceApplication Settings.
segment.target: On the server where you configured the Self-Service Portal, browse to SitesMicrosoft BitLocker Administration and MonitoringSelfServiceApplication Settings.

segment.source: In the Actions pane, click Add to open the Add Application Setting dialog box.
segment.target: In the Actions pane, click Add to open the Add Application Setting dialog box.

segment.source: In the Name field, type HelpdeskTextLanguage, where Language is the appropriate language code for the text.
segment.target: In the Name field, type HelpdeskTextLanguage, where Language is the appropriate language code for the text.

segment.source: For example, to create a localized HelpdeskText statement in Spanish, name the parameter HelpdeskTextes-es.
segment.target: For example, to create a localized HelpdeskText statement in Spanish, name the parameter HelpdeskTextes-es.

segment.source: The name of the Language folder can also be the language neutral name es instead of es-es.
segment.target: The name of the Language folder can also be the language neutral name es instead of es-es.

segment.source: If the end user’s browser is set to es-es and that folder does not exist, the parent locale (as defined in .NET) is recursively retrieved and checked, resolving to MBAM Self-Service Install DirectorySelfServiceWebsiteesNotice.txt before finally becoming the default Notice.txt file.
segment.target: If the end user’s browser is set to es-es and that folder does not exist, the parent locale (as defined in .NET) is recursively retrieved and checked, resolving to MBAM Self-Service Install DirectorySelfServiceWebsiteesNotice.txt before finally becoming the default Notice.txt file.

segment.source: This recursive fallback mimics the .NET resource loading rules.
segment.target: This recursive fallback mimics the .NET resource loading rules.

segment.source: For a list of the valid language codes you can use, see National Language Support (NLS) API Reference.
segment.target: For a list of the valid language codes you can use, see National Language Support (NLS) API Reference.

segment.source: In the Value field, type the localized text that you want to display to end users.
segment.target: In the Value field, type the localized text that you want to display to end users.

segment.target: Got a suggestion for MBAM?
